content.raw:
Updated forward/rear sensors to be angled \(50 degrees from perpendicular w/r to the ground plane\). Moved sensors up in Z to link w/ collision and avoid clipping through the world.

‌

Tested functionality with:

* Approach and touching ascending stairs \(forward \+ rear\)
* Approaching and looking over descending stairs \(forward \+ rear\)
* Approaching and looking over ramp \(forward \+ rear\)

‌

Added gas sensor transport node.  Fixed outdated example.ign launch file.
content.html:
Updated forward/rear sensors to be angled (50 degrees from perpendicular w/r to the ground plane). Moved sensors up in Z to link w/ collision and avoid clipping through the world.

‌

Tested functionality with:

  • Approach and touching ascending stairs (forward + rear)
  • Approaching and looking over descending stairs (forward + rear)
  • Approaching and looking over ramp (forward + rear)

‌

Added gas sensor transport node. Fixed outdated example.ign launch file.
